content.text:
# Prime Minister of the Republic of Tatarstan

The Prime Minister of the Republic of Tatarstan serves as the head of government of Tatarstan, a republic of Russia. Mukhammat Sabirov served as Tatarstan's first prime minister.
List of prime ministers of Tatarstan
* Mukhammat Sabirov (5 July 1991 – 17 January 1995)
* Farid Mukhametshin (17 January 1995 – 27 May 1998)
* Mintimer Shaeymiev (acting) (27 May 1998 – 10 July 1998)
* Rustam Minnikhanov (10 July 1998 – 25 March 2010)
* Ildar Khalikov (25 March 2010 – 3 April 2017)
* Aleksei Pesoshin (3 April 2017 – present)
References
